tweet: The biggest 'innovation' out of the #Ripple team was making the supply so freaking large that unit price seems cheap even though $XRP is 2nd most expensive by market cap. Tricks all the stupid $ into buying in.  Litecoin used a similar concept, but Ripple took it to the extreme.
